title: Lovulla Lyrics Ivan Vera Madhiri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Lovulla
Singer(s) : Sathya C
Lyricist : Viveka
Movie: Ivan Vera Mathiri (2013)
Music: Sathya.C

Love-la love-la love-la love-la
vilundhuten
en kavala kavala kavala kavala
marandhuten
naan avala avala avala avala
nenachiten
ippa pagala pagala pagala irava
tholachiten

Vennaiyila senja silai
thennayil paathen
annayila irundhu naan
ennanennamo aanen

Aanaaney aanen-ney, yedhedho aaneney
poneney poneney, engeyo poneney

Ne silaya pola irukenu solla mudiyala
adi silai ellaam unna pola vasam kodukala
Oru nadhi pola irukkenu enna mudiyala
ne nadandhaaley kadal pole kootam theruvila
inga pennayum aanayum padaikuradhu
bhramanoda Â vela
un mookayum kannayum padaikum pdhu
moodil irundhaan pola

en kadhal solla vachita ..
meenaaga thulla vachita ..
ennaacho ... yedhaacho ..
yedhedho .. aayaacho ..

En uyirmela oyaama theeya mootura
valiyinna ennanu nalla kaatura
oru erumbaga sirusaa thaan
kadhal theriyudhu
adhu yaana pola sila neram
maari midhikkudhu

Ezhubu odinjaa maavu kattu pottu
thirutha mudiyum
idhayathuku marundhu poda
kadhalukku theriyum

Thala mela vaanam orasum
thalakeelaa ellaam theriyum
yedhedho aaneney, engaeyo poneney

Love-la love-la love-la love-la
vilundhuten
naan avala avala avala avala
nenachiten
